C4-2.name: Paper Jam Clear Areas A,B
symptoms: Paper jam occurs between Tray 2 and Tray 3 Take Away Sensors.
Printer stops feeding paper from Tray 4 or Tray 3.
C4-2.technical_description: Logic Control on the Print Engine Controller Board detected that when paper was fed from Tray 4, the Tray 2 Take Away Sensor did not actuate within the specified time after the Tray 3 Take Away Sensor was actuated.
probable_causes: Wrinkled or damaged paper in the tray.
Paper scrap or foreign objects in the paper path.
Faulty Tray 2 or Tray 3 Take Away Sensor.
Failed I/O Board or Controller Board.
safety_notes: Always power off the printer before inspecting mechanical parts.
Do not use sharp tools to remove jammed paper.
Avoid touching exposed circuits or connectors.

steps.title: Paper Inspection
steps.instruction: Inspect the paper loaded in Tray 2 or Tray 3.
steps.details: Ensure the paper is flat, not wrinkled or torn, and properly aligned in the tray guides.
steps.question: Is the paper loaded in the tray wrinkled or damaged?

yes.action: Replace the paper with a new stack of clean sheets.
yes.note: Do not mix different paper types or weights.

steps.title: Paper Path Inspection
steps.instruction: Visually inspect the paper path for scraps, clips, or foreign objects.
steps.details: Check between Tray 2 Take Away and Tray 3 Take Away Sensors. Remove any debris found.
steps.question: Is the paper path clear?

no.action: Clear the paper path and verify that the rollers are clean and free of residue.

steps.title: Tray 3 Take Away Sensor Test
steps.instruction: Run a diagnostic to test the Tray 3 Take Away Sensor.
procedure: From Main Menu, select: Comp Input Test / HCF Unit / T/A Roll3 Sen.
Press [4] to start test, [0] to stop.
Insert and then remove a sheet of paper into the Tray 3 Take Away Sensor.
steps.question: Does the Control Panel display 'With Paper' when inserted and 'Without Paper' when removed?
steps.expected_result: The panel should correctly detect both paper presence and absence.

no.action: Replace the Tray 3 Take Away Sensor [PL 5.2].

steps.title: Tray 3 Take Away Roller Check
steps.instruction: Run the motor test to verify roller rotation.
procedure: From Main Menu, select: Comp Output Test / IOT Unit / Main Motor On.
Open Door C to observe roller movement.
steps.question: Does Tray 3 Take Away Roller rotate when Main Motor runs?

no.action: Troubleshoot the drive transmission from the High Capacity Feeder Motor to the Take Away Gear.

steps.title: Tray 2 Take Away Sensor Test
steps.instruction: Run a diagnostic to verify Tray 2 Sensor operation.
procedure: Select: Comp Input Test / IOT Unit / T/A Roll2 Sen.
Press [4] to start test, [0] to stop.
Insert and remove paper to check detection response.
steps.question: Does the panel display 'With Paper' and 'Without Paper' correctly?

no.action: Replace the Tray 2 Take Away Sensor [PL 5.1].

steps.title: High Capacity Feeder Board Replacement
steps.instruction: Replace the High Capacity Feeder Board [RRP 2-9].
steps.question: After replacement, does the error code still appear?

no.action: Problem solved. The feeder board was defective.

steps.title: Input/Output Board Replacement
steps.question: After replacement, does the error code still appear?

no.action: Problem solved. Fault found in the I/O Board.

steps.title: Print Engine Controller Board Replacement
steps.instruction: Replace the Print Engine Controller Board [RRP 1-72].
steps.question: After replacement, does the error code still appear?

no.action: Problem solved. Controller board failure detected.

steps.title: Wiring and Connector Inspection
steps.instruction: Inspect all wiring and connectors linking Tray 2, Tray 3, HCF, and I/O boards.
steps.details: Look for loose connectors, bent pins, or damaged cables. Use a continuity tester if necessary.
steps.action: Repair or replace damaged wiring as needed.

final_checklist: Run test prints from Tray 2 and Tray 3.
Verify sensors report correct status in Diagnostic Mode.
Log repair completion in service record.
C4-2.success_message: ✅ Error C4-2 resolved successfully. Printer is ready for use.
C4-2.failure_message: ⚠️ If the problem persists, escalate to Level 2 support for board-level diagnostics.
